- Made an open-world top-down survival game using JavaFX.
- Features procedurally generated worlds using J3D Texture, levels, in-game survival guide, health, hunger, a day/night cycle, and environmental threats.
- Enjoyed by 30 individual players.
- Enabled cross-platform JAR packaging for Linux, MacOS, and Windows using Gradle.
Open-world top-down survival game. Features procedurally generated worlds using J3D Texture, levels, in-game survival guide, health, hunger, a day/night cycle, and environmental threats.
Made an open-world top-down survival game using JavaFX.
• Made an open-world top-down survival game using JavaFX.
Features procedurally generated worlds using J3D Texture, levels, in-game survival guide, health, hunger, a day/night cycle, and environmental threats.
• Features procedurally generated worlds using J3D Texture, levels, in-game survival guide, health, hunger, a day/night cycle, and environmental threats.
Enabled cross-platform JAR packaging for Linux, MacOS, and Windows using Gradle.
• Enabled cross-platform JAR packaging for Linux, MacOS, and Windows using Gradle.
- Trained 2-convolution-layer Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) using **NumPy** and **Tensorflow** on 10,000 images collected with web scraping over 700 generations.

Generates 64x64 images that could plausibly be NFTs from the Bored Ape collection, but are not. Uses a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) with two convolution layers. Trained on around 10,000 images. Made for Hack The North 2022.
Trained 2-convolution-layer Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) using NumPy and Tensorflow on 10,000 images collected with web scraping over 700 generations.
• Trained 2-convolution-layer Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) using NumPy and Tensorflow on 10,000 images collected with web scraping over 700 generations.

- Implemented FreeDesktop Notifications standard for **Linux** using **C**, **GTK+**, and **libdbus**, enabling logging and scripting for each notification.
- Made user configuration easy by creating documentation, tutorials, and manual pages.
I Spy Notify lets you watch Linux desktop notifications and run scripts for each notification. It's great for logging, displaying popups, and playing sounds.
runs scripts for FreeDesktop standard notifications
Implemented FreeDesktop Notifications standard for Linux using C, GTK+, and libdbus, enabling logging and scripting for each notification.
• Implemented FreeDesktop Notifications standard for Linux using C, GTK+, and libdbus, enabling logging and scripting for each notification.
Made user configuration easy by creating documentation, tutorials, and manual pages.
• Made user configuration easy by creating documentation, tutorials, and manual pages.

- Prototyped a mobile app that prepares random jogging routes based on user location and desired distance using **React Native** and **OpenStreetMap**.
- Visualised generated route using a native map interface with **MapBox**.
A mobile app that prepares random jogging routes based on user location and desired distance.
Prototyped a mobile app that prepares random jogging routes based on user location and desired distance using React Native and OpenStreetMap.
• Prototyped a mobile app that prepares random jogging routes based on user location and desired distance using React Native and OpenStreetMap.
Visualised generated route using a native map interface with MapBox.
• Visualised generated route using a native map interface with MapBox.

- Executes **Common Lisp**, **Python 3**, and **Node.js** in the **shell** for ad hoc scripting.
- User-focused design: cross-platform support, per-language configuration, stack-based evaluation.

Execute code in the command-line, usually as part of a shell script. Has utilities to read from standard input, write to standard output, and execute a configuration file. Expressions are pushed onto a stack, which enables code to be written linearly.
Executes Common Lisp, Python 3, and Node.js in the shell for ad hoc scripting.
• Executes Common Lisp, Python 3, and Node.js in the shell for ad hoc scripting.
User-focused design: cross-platform support, per-language configuration, stack-based evaluation.
• User-focused design: cross-platform support, per-language configuration, stack-based evaluation.

- Provides interface using **Emacs Lisp** to traverse syntax tree for the Emacs text editor.
- Designed for user convenience: multiple cursor support, autocomplete, sticky highlighting.

This Emacs mode lets you traverse the Tree Sitter syntax tree. This package uses the built-in treesit package available starting from Emacs 29.
This package supports multiple-cursors.
Provides interface using Emacs Lisp to traverse syntax tree for the Emacs text editor.
• Provides interface using Emacs Lisp to traverse syntax tree for the Emacs text editor.
Designed for user convenience: multiple cursor support, autocomplete, sticky highlighting.
• Designed for user convenience: multiple cursor support, autocomplete, sticky highlighting.

- Implements machine learning feature extraction with **transformers.js** and pretrained language models from **HuggingFace** to tailor resume to job postings.
- Built for print, desktop, and mobile using **Svelte**, **TailwindCSS**, and **Strapi** CMS.
tailors resume to job postings with machine learning
Implements machine learning feature extraction with transformers.js and pretrained language models from HuggingFace to tailor resume to job postings.
• Implements machine learning feature extraction with transformers.js and pretrained language models from HuggingFace to tailor resume to job postings.
Built for print, desktop, and mobile using Svelte, TailwindCSS, and Strapi CMS.
• Built for print, desktop, and mobile using Svelte, TailwindCSS, and Strapi CMS.
- [ ] Mentored team of 4 about website hosting, HTTPS authentication, CI/CD, and **Docker**.
Mentored team of 4 about website hosting, HTTPS authentication, CI/CD, and Docker.
• Mentored team of 4 about website hosting, HTTPS authentication, CI/CD, and Docker.
This project follows along the Learn OpenGL tutorial by Joey de Vries, with a special twist of being implemented in Common Lisp.
This is a bullet hell rhythm game. Bullets fire in sync with music. The project includes a base game and accompanying map maker.

- Designed and implemented a high-performance market data pipeline using **Go**, **TypeScript**, **Kafka**, and **Redis**, handling real-time pricing for 1000+ crypto assets. Reduced network requests by 200+ per cache update and improved data freshness from 4 minutes to 30 seconds. Architected efficient caching strategies handling multiple data sources and complex cache invalidation patterns.

- Improved on core component library in **React** and **TypeScript**, unlocking complex grid-based layouts through linked input, label, and error message components. This development unblocked Design team requirements and improved system-wide UI consistency.

- Enhanced mobile user experience ahead of major retail user acquisition campaign, resolving critical UI issues including overflow errors and inconsistent layouts. Improved responsive design implementation across transaction flows, wallet management, and authentication.

- [ ] Developed and maintained full-stack services using **Express** and **MongoDB**, focusing on robust error reporting capabilities. Implemented systematic error handling improvements in response to support tickets, enhancing both UI and public API endpoint feedback.

Designed and implemented a high-performance market data pipeline using Go, TypeScript, Kafka, and Redis, handling real-time pricing for 1000+ crypto assets. Reduced network requests by 200+ per cache update and improved data freshness from 4 minutes to 30 seconds. Architected efficient caching strategies handling multiple data sources and complex cache invalidation patterns.

• Designed and implemented a high-performance market data pipeline using Go, TypeScript, Kafka, and Redis, handling real-time pricing for 1000+ crypto assets. Reduced network requests by 200+ per cache update and improved data freshness from 4 minutes to 30 seconds. Architected efficient caching strategies handling multiple data sources and complex cache invalidation patterns.

Improved on core component library in React and TypeScript, unlocking complex grid-based layouts through linked input, label, and error message components. This development unblocked Design team requirements and improved system-wide UI consistency.

• Improved on core component library in React and TypeScript, unlocking complex grid-based layouts through linked input, label, and error message components. This development unblocked Design team requirements and improved system-wide UI consistency.

Enhanced mobile user experience ahead of major retail user acquisition campaign, resolving critical UI issues including overflow errors and inconsistent layouts. Improved responsive design implementation across transaction flows, wallet management, and authentication.

• Enhanced mobile user experience ahead of major retail user acquisition campaign, resolving critical UI issues including overflow errors and inconsistent layouts. Improved responsive design implementation across transaction flows, wallet management, and authentication.

Developed and maintained full-stack services using Express and MongoDB, focusing on robust error reporting capabilities. Implemented systematic error handling improvements in response to support tickets, enhancing both UI and public API endpoint feedback.

• Developed and maintained full-stack services using Express and MongoDB, focusing on robust error reporting capabilities. Implemented systematic error handling improvements in response to support tickets, enhancing both UI and public API endpoint feedback.

- [ ] Led end-to-end development of a large-scale transportation simulation system, independently researching and architecting a solution from conception to team handoff. Established system architecture supporting horizontal/vertical scaling and maintainable future development.

- Engineered concurrent simulation engine in **Python**, handling 3000+ entities using **asyncio** and **SQLAlchemy**. Designed Entity Component System for state management, enabling complex operational scenario testing and client demonstrations.

<!--
- Implemented intelligent driver and passenger behavior using behavior trees, finite state machines, **Numpy**, and **Geographiclib**. Replaced ad hoc implementation with maintainable, extensible architecture for modeling real-world transportation patterns.
-->

- Developed an **OpenAPI** specification generator supporting 5000+ endpoints, automating API client generation across multiple testing projects (Puppeteer E2E, mobile UI). Implemented support for multiple API versions through **Django** runtime inspection and **Git** integration.

<!--
- Built a real-time simulation control interface using **FastAPI** and **React**, enabling dynamic updates to simulation parameters during execution for testing flexibility and client demonstrations.
-->

- Contributed to engineering spike exploring AI-powered ride booking by prototyping voice assistant integration using **OpenAI GPT-4** and **Retell AI**.

Led end-to-end development of a large-scale transportation simulation system, independently researching and architecting a solution from conception to team handoff. Established system architecture supporting horizontal/vertical scaling and maintainable future development.

• Led end-to-end development of a large-scale transportation simulation system, independently researching and architecting a solution from conception to team handoff. Established system architecture supporting horizontal/vertical scaling and maintainable future development.

Engineered concurrent simulation engine in Python, handling 3000+ entities using asyncio and SQLAlchemy. Designed Entity Component System for state management, enabling complex operational scenario testing and client demonstrations.

• Engineered concurrent simulation engine in Python, handling 3000+ entities using asyncio and SQLAlchemy. Designed Entity Component System for state management, enabling complex operational scenario testing and client demonstrations.

Developed an OpenAPI specification generator supporting 5000+ endpoints, automating API client generation across multiple testing projects (Puppeteer E2E, mobile UI). Implemented support for multiple API versions through Django runtime inspection and Git integration.

• Contributed to engineering spike exploring AI-powered ride booking by prototyping voice assistant integration using OpenAI GPT-4 and Retell AI.

- [ ] Engineered extensible validation system in **Python** for FreeSync certification results, supporting hundreds of evolving test cases across multiple data formats over 3+ years. Implemented robust test result verification for hardware certification process.

- Enhanced messaging protocol between **C++** host process and **Arduino** in FreeSync certification tooling, achieving 15% improvement in communication rate and certification process speed.

- Developed automated latency measurement system integrating Arduino-based data collection (**C**), data processing (**Pandas**), and visualization (**D3.js**).

- [ ] Modernized **MS Access** database system by implementing **Python**-based schema migrations and version control integration. Enabled parallel validation for teams across Canada and Taiwan while ensuring reliable release management.

Engineered extensible validation system in Python for FreeSync certification results, supporting hundreds of evolving test cases across multiple data formats over 3+ years. Implemented robust test result verification for hardware certification process.

• Engineered extensible validation system in Python for FreeSync certification results, supporting hundreds of evolving test cases across multiple data formats over 3+ years. Implemented robust test result verification for hardware certification process.

- [ ] Developed **GraphQL** APIs in **Node.js** integrating multiple data sources including **MongoDB**, legacy systems, and third-party services for identity verification, CRM, and payment processing.
- [x] Implemented fault-tolerant data synchronization system using **Azure Service Bus** and **Azure Functions** to bridge legacy API with core database.
- [x] Created a careers page using **Prismic CMS** for job definitions, **Google Cloud** for storage and notifications, **AWS** for data collection and deployment, and **Gatsby** for static site generation.
- [ ] Designed end-to-end **regression and unit tests** using **Puppeteer** and **Jest**.
Developed GraphQL APIs in Node.js integrating multiple data sources including MongoDB, legacy systems, and third-party services for identity verification, CRM, and payment processing.

• Implemented fault-tolerant data synchronization system using Azure Service Bus and Azure Functions to bridge legacy API with core database.

- Implemented ML models (VAE, GAN, GMM) with **PyTorch**, **TensorFlow**, and **scikit-learn**.
Implemented ML models (VAE, GAN, GMM) with PyTorch, TensorFlow, and scikit-learn.
